title: Yo ya'll gotta do something about minion blocking
body: I had an Irelia free hit me to death at level 1 because I literally couldn't move....

replies.body: it uses more strategy tho. like you can basically squash someone into a wall tree and rape them. sejuani and cho are pretty good
I know that, and it's cool an all but when I'm talking getting MINION blocked, not Terrain blocked. And I was literally in the middle of the lane.

minion = moving terrain
the other team has minions too so it balances out. I'll still see minion mechanics as strategy
Plus, you seriously can't tell me that a player in my Elo positioned himself in a way that allowed him to corner me into a bunch of minions.... No.
No I can't, but I can tell you that you can learn to do that to get yourself the upper hand
Well don't stand in the way of minions.

their block boxes are 100% bigger than they were in S4..

end of this season they gonna be 150% bigger, just you watch... riot has some sort of mutation that grows them 50% every preseason i swear
You're not lying actually. New patch on PBE has made minions significantly larger. Check out [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTwWjk4qK2E) for more info.

I know im not lying, every1 should know their size keeps going up by like 50% every season.

You used to be able to easily walk between a gap about (| is a minion -- is minion width) |-| now you need about |---| to get through
Oh god please no! its terrible enough as it is D:

blame riot, every year it gets bigger

(-.-* still waiting for my boarder back riot...)
